Blacknightmare:
 
Blacknightmare remembered a cr "That cr..."thought the femme "That cr 
has something that the master have to know..."

"Try to be ready and in good conditions" She told to all 
presents "Soon we will be fighttting against a rival faction" and 
looking to Crater, Bullet and blaze "Try to find out if that femme 
was the once that come in the Fortress... I trust you in your skills -
if everyone else has come in without belong our faction, try to 
capture them... If the bot resist, then kill him or her; computer in 
all ship can tell you if the bot is a memeber of blackFortress or 
not... if the bot is with a BF member then let the bot alone... Any 
question?"
